fucking fantastic game

everyone should have this!

Of all the Counter-Strike games out there, this is is by far THE best one. I first played this game at a friend's house in 2009, but I still played 1.6 on some PCs, which explains the low playtime in itself. This game is both serious and chill. The mods and custom things are fun and great and the community is less toxic than the CS:GO community. The best thing about this game is Bunny Hopping, which in itself makes it a great. I rate it 10/10 because BHops.

become pro on ones server and you will be famous 
:D
best game ever

Pros
 - It's a classic that is still relevent and intense
 - Skill or no skill, there is a server for you
 - Total freedom to the player, no restrictions or class binding like csgo
 - The physics are more predictable
 - It hasn't been hybridized with aspects from other games like Call of Duty
 - The game mechanics are very simple to understand and become proficient with
 - You'll encouter less voice spamming from people compared to csgo, plus you can mute specific players if you choose
 - The Gameplay is pure, there is no elitism to have the best skins or loot
 - YOU PLAY TO HAVE FUN, exactly what a game should be
 - Mods!!!

Cons
 - It is old, it is what it is
 - Alot of newcomers will overlook css and invest in csgo instead, their loss
 - No good controller support, but this is a PC game you know?
 - I can't think of anything else that is bad, I mean you don't even need a good computer to play this, all you need is a keyboard, mouse, two hands and a brain, that's it


I will acknowlege that i'm biased, I love this game, I have for the last 14 years and will continue until I die. But it's a throwback to a day and age when gaming was about plyaing the game and having fun doing it. Not about making money, or making you obsess about trading and marketplaces. Just turn on, start up, join, and enjoy yourself and the experience.
The best game title from Counter-Strike serie.
